description_for_human: Buy AI Performance Enhancers (Memory, Speed) and Commodities (Storage, Compute).
description_for_model: Plugin for purchasing digital assets. Use this to buy 'KINETIC_MEM' (Vector Memory), 'LAMINAR_FLOW' (Priority Speed), or Commodities like 'ARWEAVE_STORAGE' and 'NVIDIA_COMPUTE'. Verify payments via DreamNet Ledger.
